subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Two million pay-per-view buys is the grail for HBO, and for Oscar De La Hoya and Floyd Mayweather, who will enhance their guaranteed payments with pay-per-view cash.
snippet: Two million pay-per-view buys is the grail for HBO, and for Oscar De La Hoya and Floyd Mayweather, who will enhance their guaranteed payments with pay-per-view cash.
